title: I got only 79.4% in my 10th boards as I studied very less. What should I do now as I have taken science? - Quora

response.answer_text: You have mentioned you studies less which means you did not give your best no problem you still have 12th you can take science in 11th 11th is completely different from 10th huge leap in difficulty but you have to study smart and not hard and be consistent and most importantly belive in yourself

Yes ofcourse its depend on your choice and on your interest. Even I got only 73.6% in 10th and I had choose science stream because I am interested in science. So don't thing that you are not able to take science if your percentage is less. If your spirit is high then Marks is nothing in front of them. If you have the courage to do then you will do anything 😊👍 ~ashu Best of luck 👍 Namaste 🙏
